text: Soni Allah an’gumbile jenumanja kuumila mwitaka, kaneka kuumila mwindondwa lya mesi (gawalume ni wakongwe), kaneka am’bisile kuwa wamitundu jiwili (achalume ni achakongwe). Jwankongwe jwalijose jwangajigala chiilu kapena kuweleka, ikaweje kwa umanyilisi Wakwe (Allah). Ni ngakasapedwaga umi welewu nkupedwa umi welewu, kapena (jwine) kupungusyidwa mu umi wakwe, ikaweje (ipali yosopeyo) m’Chitabu (Cha Al-Lauh Al-Mahfuz), chisimu yalakweyo kwa Allah iwele yakwepepala kusyene
